title: Android TV 13 will bring better picture-in-picture support, add new accessibility options
content:
After quietly launching the first beta update earlier this month, Google is taking to I/O to announce a few more details on the Android TV 13 update.

moreâ€¦

The post Android TV 13 will bring better picture-in-picture support, add new accessibility options appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has offered up a few more details on Android TV 13, explaining that the update brings improvements to picture-in-picture and more.
